title: Advantage Garcinia Review
author: Andrew (Editor)
text:
Diet Reviews / Garcinia Cambogia / Advantage Garcinia Review 
People talk about garcinia cambogia, but does it help you lose weight? We took a closer look at Advantage Garcinia ingredients, side effects, and clinical research. Then, we read tons of product reviews on the supplement. Finally, we gathered all the facts to give you the bottom line. Advantage Garcinia Readers:   Leptigen. What is Advantage Garcinia? 
First off, Advantage Garcinia is a weight-loss support supplement that contains hydroxycitric acid, a chemical component in Garcinia cambogia. You are supposed to consume one capsule a day about thirty minutes before breakfast. It is also suggested that you continue to use for three to four months to see accurate results, which is a good suggestion. 
The company that produces Advantage Garcinia is unknown, but we do know that their official website was created in 2016. They offer a risk-free trial and include a video about the science behind hydroxycitric acid, but read on… Is this another garcinia cambogia supplement making extraordinary claims? Ineffective – “Does It Work Effectively?” 
The first thing we noticed with Advantage Garcinia was its lack of effectiveness. “When people start spending their money on supplements, and they don’t work, that is a real problem,” said our Research Editor. “If this is true for Advantage Garcinia, then dieters will quickly cease usage.” 
“There is no appetite loss using this product,” a review said. 
“I am seeing no positive effects…” another said. 
Some consumers found the supplement worked just fine. 
“I have been taking [this] for months…It [worked] within a couple of days, and the results are amazing,” one consumer wrote. 
“Have been taking [this for] little over a month…does [suppress] appetite…noticed weight loss in face and stomach…[going to] continue…” mentioned another. Scroll   Advantage Garcinia Side Effects – “What Are the Reactions?” 
The second issue we found were customer complaints of Advantage Garcinia side effects. 
One user wrote, “Within 30 minutes I began to feel light headed, weak and dizzy. I began vomiting, and my stomach was very [queasy] all day.” 
“This has caused constipation, bloating, fatigue and increased appetite,” wrote another. 
Other people did not experience any adverse reactions while using Advantage Garcinia. 
“No side effects and I are surprised since I am prone to headaches,” one dieter said. 
Another customer wrote in a review, “I have not noticed any side effects and am truly satisfied with this product. I…recommended this product to several of my friends.” 
After years of experience with dietary supplements, we have found it can take something that seems small to ruin the chance of long-term results. If Advantage Garcinia is ineffective and causes adverse reactions, that could be an issue. The Science – “Are the Studies Enough?” 
When researching Garcinia cambogia, we found many studies. However, many of them did not indicate its ability to induce weight-loss effects on the consumer. Additionally, Advantage Garcinia makes many claims about their supplement without pointing to any research to back them up. Instead, their official website only includes a video explaining the “science” behind hydroxycitric acid. Before recommending any product, we like to see an ample amount of research. There doesn’t seem to be enough evidence for us to recommend Advantage Garcinia to you.   Advantage Garcinia Work? 
Are we racing out for some Advantage Garcinia? Well, we like that the formula includes a researched component and that the company offers a free trial offer. We do have some reservations about this one due to reports of adverse reactions and ineffectiveness. There is the issue with the lack of research connecting it to weight-loss. 
If you want to lose weight, we suggest using a product backed science and shown to works 
  we’ve seen this year is one called Leptigen . Its formula includes four clinically researched components that can help jumpstart the metabolism and reduce appetite. User testimonials around the web indicate that people see great results. 
There is also a Special Trial Offer for all new customers, which seems like a great opportunity. Get Your Sample Today   Is this another garcinia cambogia supplement making extraordinary claims?
